transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe te anya call par vyast chhe. Krupya pratiksha karo athva thoda samay pachhi prayatna karo. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello ji namaskar ji Milan ji.
Executive: Haan bolo.
Customer: Ji kaise ho Ankur Singh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se ye baat hui thi na meri aapse.
Executive: Haan bolo bolo.
Customer: Ji aapne phone kiya tha care pe bataiye.
Customer: Kuch nahi wo to mere ko customer care pe baat karni thi isliye maine call kiya tha.
Executive: To sir maine maine aapko yahi to bataya tha maine aapko abhi bhi bataya tha pehle bhi maine aapse bataya tha ki kahi bhi aap call karoge mere paas hi aata hai jo mai cheeze bata raha hu sir usi ke according aap kaam kijiye dekho hota kya hai aap kuch samajhiye aap ek business chala rahe hai aapne aap isme aisa hai sir ji mere ko kya hai catalog design karke chahiye mere ko wo koi bhejamari nahi chahiye ki aap yaha se add kar do wo kar do.
Executive: Nahi nahi to add wo mere wo mere Jogesh ji se baat ho gayi hai unhone mere ko sab bata diya mai us according pe baat kar lunga ho jayega mera kaam. Dekho sir isme aisa hota hai product add karne ke liye koi aapko mana nahi kar raha dekho isme time aur material to aapko dena hoga na.
Customer: Material aap meri baat suniye wo meri baat ho gayi hai wo hum kar lenge apne hisab se behalf se.
Executive: Nahi wo to wo to aap kar lijiye wo koi dikkat nahi hai aap mujhe product ki images dijiye naam dijiye wo product hum apne end se yaha pe aapke add kar denge usme koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine aapko dekho naam de diya quantity de di sab de diya.
Executive: Sir lekin photo lekin sir photo to aapko deni padegi na ye cheeze copyright me aa jati hai kai baar. Company bhi us cheez ko allow nahi karti sir hum google se uthane ke liye company allow nahi karti hai ab dekho isme maan lo aaj aapne suppose kijiye mujhe apna thoda time nikal ke apni images de di to baar baar to aapko time dena nahi padega na baar baar kahi bhi phone karne ki aavashyakta nahi padegi aur mai to regular aapse touch me rahunga aapki help ke liye aapko hi to cooperate karke chalna hai na sir time to dekho dena padega aap itni badi firm chala rahe hai.
Customer: Wo mai apne hisab se apne hisab se baat kar lunga wo aapko koi dikkat nahi hai aap apne hisab se.
Executive: Nahi wo to koi sir wo to koi dikkat nahi aapne mujhe PDF di thi usme koi dikkat nahi mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai mai apne hisab se wo Jogesh ji ne bataya na waise karke kaam karunga isme isme bataya Jogesh ji se baat ho gayi na wo unhone bataya aise karke kar dijiye to ho jayega.
Customer: To unhone unhone kya bataya aapko.
Customer: Wo bol rahe the ke aapko baat hui waise baat kar lijiye dusra kuch nahi bataya.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Nahi meri bhi unse abhi meri bhi unse abhi baat hui hai unhone mujhe saari cheeze batai aur maine unko same cheeze batai hai to unhone kaha ki isi tarike se work hota hai ab wo kuch aapko alag bataye to usse koi wo nahi hai sir kyuki dekho unhone aapko aapko ye ye package diya unhone thik hai lekin ab jo package mere paas me service mere paas me aayi help to nahi kar paunga na aapki wo to baar baar help nahi kar payenge aur maine isliye aapse kaha tha ki aap video meeting pe aai video meeting pe maine aapko lead dikhai listing karai aapki.
Customer: Nahi sir aapne ke bare me bataya wo to sab mere ko aata hai wo aap baar baar dikhayenge to usme kuch nahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir baar baar sir wo baar baar wali baat nahi hai aap samajhiye.
Customer: Whatsapp pe aap is time whatsapp pe hi baat hui ke bhai aap kya bol rahe hai.
Executive: Sir ek to bataiye aap hi ko bataiye cheeze copyright act me hi to aa sakti hai na to hum aisa kaam kyu kare aap pehli baar sir sir sir ye mai pehli baar use nahi kar raha hu IndiaMART wo mujhe pata hai aap bahut purane supplier hai mujhe pata hai hume bhi pata hai saari cheeze aap pehli baar catalog nahi design karwa rahe aise na wo bhi isi recording hua tha aur aage bhi aise recording karna hai apne aapne apna dusra kuch karna nahi hai aapne cheeze sir aap change ho rahi hai aap samajhiye baat ko.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir wo mere ko changes wagera kuch nahi chahiye mai apne hisab se baat kar lunga ab iske liye ab iske liye product ki jo photos wagera hai.
Executive: Mere paas abhi itna time nahi hai ke aapse mai.
Executive: Ek baat bataiye to kaam ke liye to time dena padega na kaam ke liye sir time to nikalna padega na aapko.
Customer: Wo wo mere paas itna time nahi hai mai aapke.
Executive: Ek baat bataiye nahi nahi sir wo mai apne hisab se baat kar lunga sir ji.
Customer: Milan ji.
Executive: Sir aap apne hisab se kar rahe hai achi baat hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aap apne hisab se aap kar rahe hai achi baat hai mujhe wo koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai.
Executive: Lekin aap in cheezo ko samajhiye.
Customer: Wo mai apne hisab se customer care me baat karke wo mai aapko bata denge wo okay dusri kuch abhi baat nahi karni hai mere ko.
Executive: Nahi aap dekho images aap mujhe share kijiye mai aapke catalog me add kar dunga mujhe koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai aur maine pehle bhi nahi kaha aapse aapne mujhe PDF di maine PDF add kar di aapki lekin PDF me jo itni images wagera hai wo to aap hi ko dekh ke deni padegi na sir.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hamara jo kaam hai aapko material dena hai aur material aap hame doge wo material ke according hum aapka catalog bana ke de denge.
Customer: Wo apne hisab se customer care me baat kar lunga.
Executive: Thik hai koi baat nahi sir koi nahi koi baat nahi sir koi nahi okay thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants catalog designed without any hassle.

- Does not want to share product images.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of providing images.

- Executive offered to add images to the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will contact customer care.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog design, product images, copyright, pdf
